item.description:
Thanks to Kim, we finally found a place that will allow us to have a playgroup indoors! Especially for Pets in Sudbury is granting us use of their ring on JAN 30 from 1pm to 3pm! Here are directions to the facility: http://www.especially....

Spread the word! All maltese are welcome!
See you soon,
Suzanne

For more information, see Thanks to Kim, we finally found a place that will allow us to have a playgroup indoors! Especially for Pets in Sudbury is granting us use of their ring! Here are directions to the facility: http://www.especially....

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: INDOOR! Maltese Jan-Feb Meetup
